attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If you like to smoke marijuana in your own leisure time, its your choice and you can do it if you want to, but you have to buy it illegally which can contain other DANGEROUS substances, so if you want marijuana to become legalized, and sold under a controlled set of rules, sign this petition!

For example: The stronger the potency (% of THC) in the marijuana, the higher the cost, and an appropriate age limit should be in place.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
